    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addEdgesFromJSON(java.lang.String edgesString)
      Parses the output string from the /controller/nb/v2/topology/default API from the OpenDaylight controller and adds the resulting edges to this Network nodes.
      void addNodesFromJSON(java.lang.String nodesString)
      Parses the output string from the /controller/nb/v2/switchmanager/default/nodes API from the OpenDaylight controller and adds the resulting nodes to this Network object.

      • addNodesFromJSON

        public void addNodesFromJSON(java.lang.String nodesString)
        Parses the output string from the /controller/nb/v2/switchmanager/default/nodes API from the OpenDaylight controller and adds the resulting nodes to this Network object.
        Parameters:
        nodesString - The JSON string result from the Controller API

      • addEdgesFromJSON

        public void addEdgesFromJSON(java.lang.String edgesString)
        Parses the output string from the /controller/nb/v2/topology/default API from the OpenDaylight controller and adds the resulting edges to this Network nodes. NOTE: run this after adding the vertexes, or it may result in crashes.
        Parameters:
        edgesString -
        See Also:
        addNodesFromJSON(String nodesString)
